Tyrael: I see...

He moves next to the three, looking at the sea. He glows a cool shade 
of blue.

Tyrael: My original mission was to either capture or dispose of 
Megatron. My superiors value the Pax Cybertronia and Megatron 
threatened it senselessly. Now though... I am uncertain of what Hydras 
will do. But if he is partly Megatron, I can only think he will act 
similarly. Thus, I believe my objectives are unchanged, only the 
object is.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: He is a much bigger threat now then just Megatron. He 
has been merged with Galvatron, both of their minds working together.
